projects.name: Event Website for KIET RANN23
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive event Website for the KIET RANN23 Inter-College Sports Competition, facilitating seamless coordination and communication among participating colleges. Features included participant registration, Event Details.

projects.name: Secure Vote
projects.description: Designed and developed an innovative system enabling Aadhar and voter card verification with user-friendly drag-and-drop interface. Reduced the Fake Access Of Voting System by 90% while maintaining high accuracy, ensuring seamless user access.

projects.name: LeaveEase
projects.description: Conceptualized and developed an efficient online leave management system to automate the leave request and approval process. Implemented a centralized leave database, enabling accurate leave tracking and reducing administrative errors by 30%.

experiences.description: Developed a comprehensive event Website for the KIET RANN23 Inter-College Sports Competition, facilitating seamless coordination and communication among participating colleges.

full_output.name: Divyanshu Varshney
achievements_and_awards: Received accolades for excellence in project execution, creativity, and technical proficiency, positioning the teams solution as the standout project in the Web3 category.
